attributes.action: Ban Dogs From Being Euthanized For Small Attacks On People.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have created this petition to ban the euthanasia on dogs that have attacked people because I believe that dogs do not get a fair chance in any animal attack on a human. I think that euthanizing a dog for biting a human is unfair as in our society we see murderers or cerial killers get put into prison for a horrific crime, whereas if a dog attacks someone and causes a puncture wound from a bite or scratch, they are immediately euthanized without at least a investigation as to why. The dog's owner should be investigated and the dog should at least be allowed a second chance.
